description:
Durable and unrestrictive for projecting complex routes. The stretch-cotton twill in the Dirtbag Shorts is light enough to breathe but burly enough to stand up to sharp granite. The added bonus is that they look just fine when you wear them into town.

  • Made of durable yet soft heavyweight cotton twill and spandex
  • Elasticized waistband with drawcord for adjustability
  • 2 front hand pockets, and 2 rear drop-in pockets
name: Black Diamond Dirtbag Shorts Twill - Women's
